title: The Land: South Lancashire coast
creator_credit: Richard Guinea, Julia Spark and Granada International Productions
brief_description: This film shows how man has adapted the south Lancashire coastline to meet the needs of work and recreation. The large industrial dockland complex of Liverpool shows how man has completely altered the coastal environment in order to satisfy his economic needs. Suitable for secondary level.
